content: Nov 17 Investors seeking steady income flows may have ignored the technology sector and the unexpected impact technology is having on companies in other industries  Kera Van Valen  a portfolio manager at Epoch Investment Partners  said on Friday.

content: Electricity producer Talen Energy Corp  said private equity firm Riverstone Holdings LLC will buy the remaining stake it does not already own in the company for about $1.8 billion  amid a string of deals in the U.S. power industry.
name: PPL Corporation
title: Riverstone to take Talen Energy private for $1.8 billion
